Fundamentals

  • Programming basics recap
  • More Julia fundamentals
    • The type system & multiple dispatch
    • Packages, environments and project organization
    • Performance optimization
  • Code organization and git / github
References & Materials
  • The official Julia documentation
  • The Julia discourse forum
  • Youtube video on developing Julia packages
  • The git and github documentation
  • Online git tutorials

Data Science Toolkit

  • Tabular data and DataFrames.jl
  • Visualization and Makie.jl
  • Network analysis and Graphs.jl
References & Materials
  • The docs: Makie.jl, DataFrames.jl, Graphs.jl
  • The Beautiful Makie website, with many nice plotting examples
  • The Julia Data Science online book, containing many simple examples
  • The 2022 book Julia for Data Analysis
  • The blog of Bogumli Kaminski, author of the DataFrames.jl package

Bayesian Modeling

  • Probabilistic programming with Turing.jl
  • Probabilistic programming with Stan
  • Low-level interface with LogDensityProblems.jl, TransformVariables.jl and DynamicHMC.jl
References & Materials
  • The book Statistical Rethinking and Youtube lecture by Richard McElreath
  • The book Regression and Other Stories by Andrew Gelman et al.
  • The excellent Stan documentation

Project Topics

  • Main path analysis and MainPaths.jl
  • Patent analytics
    • JuliaPatents: PatentsBase.jl, PatentsLens.jl, PatentsLandscapes.jl
    • Data sources: EPO PATSTAT, Lens.org
  • Survey analysis

Further Topics

  • Agent-based models and Agents.jl
  • Differential equation models and DifferentialEquations.jl
